LaunchRequest.speechText: Welcome {username} to the Discord unofficial API skill !
LaunchRequest.repromptText: {username}, you can ask me anything, like maybe your last mention.

HelpHandler.speechText: You can ask me your last mention and mark it as read, or send a message to something defined in the aliases file !

ErrorHandler.speechText: An error occured, can you say your command again ?

CancelAndStopHandler.speechText: See you next time on Discord !

GetLastMentionIntent.speechText: Your last mention was the {mentionDate} by {mentionAuthor}. The message content is "{mentionContent}". Say "mark last mention as read" to mark it as read.

success.speechText: Your last mention by {mentionAuthor} have been marked as read !

error.speechText: Sorry, I couldn't mark your last mention as read
